text: Ve ¢ ( ] | 11# A\l thumb rolling: pRT———— g Pra—— position overlap (kalo gia spine, palami xeriou, muti-metwpo) kai medium pressure Wiinging: best for limbs or back. Hands sliding in opposide directions — hands meet ‘mid-stroke. Hands in full contact — medium pressure. Mpainei pros to telos tou session Circling: good for abdomen(low pressure) and lower back(higher pressure) kukliki kinisi me ta xeria. Clockwise — front body. Anti clockwise for back. Palm static pressure: good for thigh, calf, lower back(non static here)
